Level.campaign: Actual Lizard Tactics Jam Map for Pride
Level.Objective: Defeat all enemies to save the theater!

Drasan Winterbloom/W--what? The theater! People are--? AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,right,,Shocked,-5,0 MoveCam/,,Drasan Winterbloom MovePortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,3,0 Continue./NextBranch

Xander Bilt/[He grumbles and stomps as he walks] Bah, Strider! Curse your name! Curse this theater for [i]celebrating[/i] your name! Enough of it all. Rubble Rousers, tear this place down! ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander Bilt,left,,Yell Mad MoveCam/,,Xander Bilt Wait/1 PlayAnim/Xander Bilt,Slash MovePortrait/Xander Bilt,14,0,160 Wait/.2 MovePortrait/Xander Bilt,16,0,160 FlipPortrait/Xander Bilt Wait/.4 MovePortrait/Xander Bilt,15,0,160 FlipPortrait/Xander Bilt Continue./NextBranch

Rubble Rouser Bruiser/The boss says this place has got to go! No one supporting these shmucks has a place in [b]our[/b] town! ClearPortraits/ MoveCam/,,Rubble Rouser Bruiser AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,right,Red,Mad,4,0 Wait/.46 PlayAnim/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Slash Continue./NextBranch

Loud Theater Enjoyer/Trying to stop the showing of this play -- are you daft? Strider's efforts were only truly given life through [b]Bolt-Action Love[/b]! It is [b]the[/b] essential crossbowpunk love story. Only a ignoramus would miss the cleverly delivered metaphors in the play's depiction of cocking. MoveCam/,,Loud Theater Enjoyer AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Sad Continue./NextBranch

Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Kuh, what? Crossbowwhatsit? Look, anything Strider, it's gotta go. Ain't she done enough damage to fine people, like our boss? ChangeExpression/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Mad ChangeExpression/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Sad MovePortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,5,0 Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/That Rubble Rouser guy is right! We don't have to stand for this! We can take matters in to our own hands! We can tear down this injust favoritism for over-hyped product line crossbows! RemovePortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,left,Red,Angry,35,0 MoveCam/,,Irate Crossbow Aficionado MovePortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,15,0,300 Continue./NextBranch

Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Uh, yeah. Yeah! Whatever gets your engine going, get smashing. ChangeExpression/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Quizzical MoveCam/,,Rubble Rouser Bruiser MovePortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,6,0,200 Wait/.25 Continue./NextBranch

Harrien Lifts/Bwuh?! Rubble Rousers? Hey, they're tearing up the place! Everyone, get your community defense face on, it's time to wrassle! ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Harrien Lifts,Harrien/Lifts,left,,Yell MovePortrait/Harrien Lifts,18,0,60 ZoomCam/12 Continue./NextBranch
/ MoveCam/,,Harrien Lifts EndConvImmediately/

Nobeta Lifts/This is wild. Gotta get a grip... [Nobeta shakes her head] Oh, hey, Mary! SetVal/TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo,=:0 AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left,,Blank,20,0 AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta/Lifts,right,,Concerned MovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts,5,0,80 FlipPortrait/Mary O Nette WaitForDialogue/ MovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts,7,0,180 / ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Happy Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/Oh, Nobeta Lifts. It is time to fight strange bad people, hmm? Do not worry, I will be there if you are ever harmed. Wait/.15 FlipPortrait/Mary O Nette Wait/.5 MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,15,0,80 Continue./NextBranch

Nobeta Lifts/I should worry about you! Get behind me, and we will chase these goons out. Wait/1 ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Excited MovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts,8,0,150,false Wait/.5 ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Winking FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts Wait/.5 ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Happy Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/It can be as you say. It can be time to... get behind you. ChangeExpression/Mary O Nette,Happy Run/RemoveTalkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Nobeta Lifts SetStat/Mary O Nette,Morale,+:3 SetStat/Nobeta Lifts,Morale,+:1 SetStat/Mary O Nette,Psy,+:1 SetVal/Lesbian Discussions,+:1 PortraitParticles/Mary O Nette,Heart Wait/.25 MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,15,0,80 WaitForPostDialogue SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 1,Nobeta Lifts,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Mary O Nette,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Mary O Nette,Yellow Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/Perhaps [b]she[/b] can call me little girl. That would be acceptable. SetVal/TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo,=:0 AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left,,Winking,18,0 Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/...ah, Nobeta Lifts. [She looks up at her] Behind you, yes? AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta/Lifts,right,,Concerned,5,0 RemovePortrait/Mary O Nette AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left,,Winking,18,0 FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Concerned MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,15,0,80 Wait/.5 FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/Of course! Dad is always saying to me, "these muscles are for protecting you, little girl." ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Kind MovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts,8,0,60 / Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/O--oh. PortraitParticles/Mary O Nette,Hearts ChangeExpression/Mary O Nette,Blank Continue./NextBranch

Nobeta Lifts/So [i]these[/i] muscles -- [Nobeta flexes briefly] -- are for [b]you[/b], little girl! [Nobeta grabs Mary's arm and leads towards the next firing position] Well, let's go! FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Winking Wait/.25 PortraitParticles/Nobeta Lifts,ExclamationsSmall FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts WaitForDialogue/ MovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts,-15,0,140 FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Happy Wait/.25 Wait/.25 MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,2,0,130 Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/O--oh. [She stumbles along, easily moved by Nobeta Lifts] Yes. PortraitParticles/Mary O Nette,Hearts Run/RemoveTalkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Nobeta Lifts SetVal/Lesbian Discussions,+:1 SetStat/Mary O Nette,Psy,+:1 SetStat/Mary O Nette,Morale,+:2 SetStat/Nobeta Lifts,Morale,+:2 WaitForPostDialogue SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 2,Nobeta Lifts,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Mary O Nette,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 2,Mary O Nette,Yellow Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/Hey, Nobeta Lifts, when it is... time after the battle, would you--? AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta Lifts,right FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts Run/TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo,=:0 Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/[Nobeta Lifts flexes as she gives Mary her attention] Ah, what was that? FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts PortraitParticles/Nobeta Lifts,ExclamationsSmall Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/Goodness alright calm down. PortraitParticles/Mary O Nette,Hearts Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/Hmm? Ah, what? Something about after this battle? ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/After this battle, would you have time for... a date? Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/Oh! Oh! [She pauses and stares in to middle-space] Oh. Yes, actually. Plenty of time. Oh, but now, I need to... ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Happy / Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/[Nobeta gets in to position and flexes to draw her bow string] Yes. For this time, please keep doing... the things you are doing. PortraitParticles/Nobeta Lifts,ExclamationsSmall SetVal/Mary O Nette,Psy,+:1 SetStat/Mary O Nette,Morale,+:3 SetStat/Nobeta Lifts,Morale,+:3 FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts Run/RemoveTalkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Nobeta Lifts MovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts,0,0 SetVal/Lesbian Discussions,+:1 WaitForDialogue/ PortraitParticles/Mary O Nette,Heart WaitForPostDialogue SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Nobeta Lifts,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Mary O Nette,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Mary O Nette,Yellow Continue./NextBranch

Clark Lutrinae/Man, I really don't wanna fight you. I was really hoping someone else would handle you... look at those arms! You could tear me apart! AddPortrait/Clark Lutrinae,Clark Lutrinae,left,,Concerned AddPortrait/Harrien Lifts,Harrien Lifts,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch

Harrien Lifts/...Well, that just sucks all the fun out of fighting you. What's someone so meek doing with this lot? ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Kind MovePortrait/Harrien Lifts,7,0 Continue./NextBranch

Clark Lutrinae/I... really don't know. I've been trying to find where it went wrong, but all I can really conclude is that I made very dumb decisions. ChangeExpression/Clark Lutrinae,Focused Continue./NextBranch

Harrien Lifts/Sounds like a lot of us, honestly. ...Look, I can't undo the stuff you've been dealt;; but I can offer you an out. C'mon and join us! If you're on the field, you must have some skill, right? ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Excited ChangeExpression/Clark Lutrinae,Blank Continue./NextBranch
Clark Lutrinae/W-w-what? Um, I... no;; I'd really just weigh you down. Continue./NextBranch

Harrien Lifts/Hey, c'mon;; look at these guns. A little extra weight won't bug me. ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Happy MovePortrait/Harrien Lifts,8,0,110 Wait/1 FlipPortrait/Harrien Lifts PortraitParticles/Harrien Lifts,ExclamationsSmall ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Winking Wait/.25 FlipPortrait/Harrien Lifts Continue./NextBranch

Clark Lutrinae/...W-well;; okay. ...Thank you. SetStat/Clark Lutrinae,Army,=:0 SetStat/Clark Lutrinae,Morale,+:4 Run/Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Clark Lutrinae,Swap In Name,Clark Lutrinae,Swap In ID,Clark Lutrinae/Happy ChangeExpression/Clark Lutrinae,Happy RemoveConv/West Approach Recognized SetVal/WestApproachFlag,=:3 Run/RemoveTalkability,Speaker One,Clark Lutrinae,Speaker Two,Harrien Lifts SetVal/Clark Lutrinae Alive,=:1 PortraitParticles/Clark Lutrinae,Heart ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Happy SetRelationshipLabel/Clark,Harrien Lifts,Hello Daddy,false SetRelationshipLabel/Harrien Lifts,Harrien Lifts,New Friend,false WaitForPostDialogue SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 4,Clark Lutrinae,Yellow Continue./NextBranch

Drasan Winterbloom/Oh, what do we have here? [Drasan sees an open container of clothes for performers] These clothes are... SetVal/AsandrReachedClothes,=:2 AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,left,,Quizzical RemoveConv/Asandr First Clothes Continue./NextBranch

Drasan Winterbloom/[Drasan nervously grabs a couple outfits from the chest] ChangeExpression/Drasan Winterbloom,Concerned MovePortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,10,0 PlaySound/Card Shuffle Continue./NextBranch

Andras Winterbloom/I could... use a change. ClearPortraits/ SetStat/Andras Winterbloom,Morale,+:3 SetStat/Andras Winterbloom,Psy,+:1 SetStat/Andras Winterbloom,Dodge,+:3 SetStat/Andras Winterbloom,Accuracy,+:5 SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,+:1 Run/Asandr Progresses Script AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Happy,10,0 Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Andras Winterbloom PortraitParticles/Andras Winterbloom,Heart Run/Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Drasan Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Andras Winterbloom,Swap In ID,Andras/Winterbloom SetVal/Drasan Winterbloom Alive,=:0 SetVal/Andras Winterbloom Alive,=:1 WaitForPostDialogue SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Andras Winterbloom,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Andras Winterbloom,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Dodge + 3,Andras Winterbloom,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Accuracy + 5,Andras Winterbloom,Yellow Continue./LoadConv/Round Start Dialogue Dispatch

Andras Winterbloom/If I can change anything, then... [Andras carefully presses a sword to their lip] SetString/AndrasReadyToShave,INVALID AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Nervous Continue./NextBranch

Sandra Winterbloom/...that feels much better. AddPortrait/Sandra Winterbloom,Sandra Winterbloom,,Happy SetStat/Sandra Winterbloom,Morale,+:3 SetStat/Sandra Winterbloom,Psy,+:1 SetStat/Sandra Winterbloom,Dodge,+:3 SetStat/Sandra Winterbloom,Accuracy,+:5 PortraitParticles/Sandra Winterbloom,Heart SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,+:1 Run/Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Andras Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Sandra Winterbloom,Swap In ID,Sandra/Winterbloom Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Sandra Winterbloom AddStatus/Asandr Winterbloom,Talkable SetVal/Andras Winterbloom Alive,=:0 SetVal/Sandra Winterbloom Alive,=:1 Run/AddTalkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Sandra Winterbloom WaitForPostDialogue/ SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Sandra Winterbloom,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Sandra Winterbloom,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Dodge + 3,Sandra Winterbloom,Yellow SpawnFloatingText/Accuracy + 5,Sandra Winterbloom,Yellow Continue./NextBranch

Clark Lutrinae/I mean;; maybe the author made a small mistake about the bolt-head manufacturer, but-- AddPortrait/Clark Lutrinae,Clark Lutrinae,left,,Concerned AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,right,,Sad Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/A small mistake! Lakshmi would never be caught dead wi- [The scuffle outside rattles the windows] ChangeExpression/Clark Lutrinae,Sad Wait/.3 PlaySound/Mace Hit2 Wait/.15 PlaySound/Weapon Breaking Wait/.15 PlaySound/Mace Hit Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/Argh;; there's never enough time to educate arbalest-ignorants! Let's teach them proper technique! ChangeExpression/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Mean FlipPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado Continue./NextBranch
Clark Lutrinae/Uh... alright... ChangeExpression/Clark Lutrinae,Neutral MovePortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,-15,0 Continue./NextBranch

Clark Lutrinae/Didn't think Xander was so... [Clark sighs] I wanted to spend a nice weekend with a cute guy and maybe his friends but this isn't that. ClearPortraits/Clark Lutrinae ChangeExpression/Clark Lutrinae,Headache RemoveTagFromGroup/1,Passive RemoveTagFromGroup/1,Inactive / / SetVal/WestApproachFlag,=,2 Run/AddTalkability,Speaker One,Clark Lutrinae,Speaker Two,Harrien Lifts / / Continue./LoadConv/Round Start Dialogue Dispatch
/ SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=:1 RemoveTagFromArmy/1,Inactive RemoveTagFromArmy/1,Passive RemoveConv/West Approach Recognized EndConvImmediately/ /

Mary O Nette/Finally time to wear something more comfortable, hmm? AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left,,Happy AddPortrait/Sandra Winterbloom,Sandra Winterbloom,right,,Happy IfValRun/Nobeta Lifts Can Talk,=,Nobeta Lifts,Run,_AddStatus,Mary O Nette,Talkable Run/Remove Talkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Sandra Winterbloom Continue./NextBranch
Sandra Winterbloom/Ahah, yea, this... felt more fitting. Just wish I could do something more with my hair. Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/Y'know, I actually do have something for that. Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/And... there. Run/Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Sandra Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Asandr Winterbloom,Swap In ID,Asandr/Winterbloom RemovePortrait/Sandra Winterbloom PortraitParticles/Asandr Winterbloom,Sparkles AddPortrait/Asandr Winterbloom,Asandr/Winterbloom,right,,Happy Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Asandr Winterbloom SetVal/Sandra Winterbloom Alive,=:0 SetVal/Asandr Winterbloom Alive,=:1 Continue./NextBranch

Asandr Winterbloom/Aaah, I love it! Thank you so much Mary! Oh, uhm, I'm going to try the name Asandr for now. Mary O Nette/"Asandr Winterbloom", it suits you. Later will we have time to talk about [i]other[/i] possible changes, hmm? Loud Theater Enjoyer/Rubble Rousers, entitled critics, bah. You clearly don't see the metaphors for bittersweet sorrow in the choice of Lakshmi's bolts. AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Amused MoveCam/Loud Theater Enjoyer Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Golem/WRONG OPINION DETECTED. AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Golem,Rubble Rouser Golem,right,,Neutral ChangeExpression/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Irritated Continue./NextBranch

Loud Theater Enjoyer/And what even [b]is[/b] "over centralization" of such a crucial crossbow. Everyone knows the 20DV changed the world. Fools! AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Quizzical MoveCam/Loud Theater Enjoyer Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Ey keep it down up there! We're busy! AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,right,,Yell ChangeExpression/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Mean Continue./NextBranch

Loud Theater Enjoyer/Did you even pick up on [b]any[/b] of the subthemes about recoil representing revolution? And you dare say you know this craft! AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Amused MoveCam/Loud Theater Enjoyer Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/You dare?! That's it, this gas blob is getting it, too! Coderick Gutterson/Bah, what are you supposed to be? You're so freakishly tall! Put those muscles away, you're embarassing yourself. Harrien Lifts/Bwuh, are you trying to insult me? [He grunts] Be rude to my friends or me, and I will break you. ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Yell ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Irritated MovePortrait/Harrien Lifts,14,0,40 Wait/.5 ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Concerned MovePortrait/Coderick Gutterson,5,0 Continue./EndConv

Coderick Gutterson/Well look who inherited her father's huge body! Grah, you can't attract men like me with [b]that[/b] hair cut. Nobeta Lifts/W--well, good! [She grunts] I don't want to attract men like you! ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Irritated ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Irritated Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Huh, I can barely see you. You must not be important! Do everyone a favor and grow up, you little girl! AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,right,,Yell Mad,4,0 AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left,,Quizzical,15,0 PortraitParticles/Coderick Gutterson,Exclamation MovePortrait/Coderick Gutterson,7,0 Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/[b]You[/b] do not get to call me a little girl. Show respect, creep. ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Irritated ChangeExpression/Mary O Nette,Mean MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,14,0 Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Ech, what are you even going for? Make up your mind! I, Coderick Gutterson, and the rest of [b]civil[/b] society need to know if you're a man or not! AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,right,,Mad,4,0 AddPortrait/Arora,Arora,left,,Winking PortraitParticles/Coderick Gutterson,Exclamation MovePortrait/Coderick Gutterson,7,0 Continue./NextBranch

Arora/Ouch! My turn, how about... Your parents named you Coderick, and you kept that name. Coderick Gutterson/Now doesn't [b]this guy[/b] look entirely uncomfortable. It's your skin, buddy, get used to it! Nothing ever changes about the body we are given! AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,right,,Mad,4,0 AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,left,,Sad PortraitParticles/Coderick Gutterson,Exclamation MovePortrait/Coderick Gutterson,7,0 Continue./NextBranch

Xander Bilt/So you're the leader of this pro-Strider propaganda affair! Do you understand how much she has ruined my financial affairs!? AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,Yell Mad,17,0 AddPortrait/Harrien Lifts,Harrien/Lifts,right,,Mad MovePortrait/Xander Bilt,15,0 Continue./NextBranch

Harrien Lifts/I can only think of so many reasons for that, and all of them are worth breaking a chair over your head. MovePortrait/Harrien Lifts,7,0 ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Mean Continue./NextBranch
Xander Bilt/It doesn't matter. If I get through you, the theater is as good as destroyed. Take this! MovePortrait/Xander Bilt,13,0 Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Harrien EndConvImmediately/

Xander Bilt/If I were you, young lady, I wouldn't follow in your father's foolish footsteps. AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,Yell Mad AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta/Lifts,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/His footsteps lead right up to kicking your butt! Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Nobeta EndConvImmediately/

Xander Bilt/Young man, surely I can provide you a better opportunity than working with this motley crew. AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,Yell Mad AddPortrait/Asandr Winterbloom,Asandr/Winterbloom,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Asandr Winterbloom/It's...well it's young woman now. Continue./NextBranch
Xander Bilt/Oh, my apologies. Offer still stands. Continue./NextBranch
Asandr Winterbloom/Absolutely not. Who would want to work with someone like you? Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Asandr EndConvImmediately/

Xander Bilt/...This isn't what I want to be doing with my time. Run away young lady, and I promise on my family name you won't be harmed. AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,Yell Mad AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/I'm not going to abandon my friends! Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Mary EndConvImmediately/
Xander Bilt/My my, what rare talents. You're truly wasted here. AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,Yell Mad AddPortrait/Arora,Arora,right,,Mean Continue./NextBranch

Arora/Thanks, but no thanks. Let's just move onto the scene where I beat you, shall we? RemoveConv/Xander and Arora ChangeExpression/Xander Bilt,Irritated ChangeExpression/Arora,Mad Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Arora EndConvImmediately/

Xander Bilt/Clark! Lad, what are you doing? Get back to being obedient and smash the theater, not me and my men! AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,Yell Mad AddPortrait/Clark Lutrinae,Clark/Lutrinae,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Clark Lutrinae/Oh don't worry, it's not [b]your[/b] men I want to [b]smash[/b]. RemoveConv/Xander and Clark Lutrinae ChangeExpression/Clark Lutrinae,Irritated Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Clark Lutrinae EndConvImmediately/
Reminder For Players/[You can save at the start of your turn, using the button on the bottom left of the pop up.] Continue./NextBranch

Harrien Lifts/Oof, that's the last one of those I can take today. I'm out, have fun kids. SetVal/Harrien Lifts Alive,=:0 AddPortrait/Harrien Lifts,Harrien/Lifts,left,,Headache EndConvImmediately/ Continue/EndConv
Nobeta Lifts/Bwuh... I'm going to go... take a nap somewhere. [She scuffles off] SetVal/Nobeta Lifts Alive,=:0 AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta/Lifts,left,,Headache Continue/EndConv

Mary O Nette/[She stammers around] [i]Winding. Clark Lutrinae/Damnit Clark Lutrinae... Gotta stop following these... muscley... [Clark Lutrinae groans and leaves] SetVal/Clark Lutrinae Alive,=:0 AddPortrait/Clark Lutrinae,Clark Lutrinae/,left,,Headache Continue/EndConv
Arora/That was my best, and now I'm gone. Good luck or something! SetVal/Arora Alive,=:0 AddPortrait/Arora,Arora/Masculine,left,,Headache Continue/EndConv
Drasan Winterbloom/I knew I wouldn't get the role... [He withdraws] SetVal/Drasan Winterbloom Alive,=:0 AddPortrait/Drasan Lifts,Drasan/Winterbloom,left,,Headache Continue/EndConv

Andras Winterbloom/That's... fine... I had some questions I needed to think about, anyways. [Andras leaves] SetVal/Andras Winterbloom Alive,=:0 AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras/Winterbloom,left,,Headache Continue/EndConv

Sandra Winterbloom/That hurt, but... Overall, this was a good day. Only regret is this... oof, injury. [She leaves] SetVal/Sandra Winterbloom Alive,=:0 AddPortrait/Sandra Winterbloom,Sandra/Winterbloom,,left,Headache Continue/EndConv

Asandr Winterbloom/That hurt, but... Overall, this was a good day. Only regret is this... oof, injury. [She leaves] SetVal/Asandr Winterbloom Alive,=:0 AddPortrait/Asandr Winterbloom,Asandr/Winterbloom,left,,Headache Continue/EndConv
Xander Bilt/That'll teach them to praise that business destroying vagrant. [He spits] Alright Rubble Rousers, keep at it! AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Uh boss, I think we have company. AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,right,,Blank ChangeExpression/Xander Bilt,Irritated Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/Excuse me, but it is time for you to stop this nonsense. This play is important -- I want to see other lesbians on stage. IfValGoTo/Mary O Nette Alive,=,0,BRANCH[Bah] ClearPortraits/Xander Bilt AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,right,,Mean,3,0 MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,7,0,80 Continue./NextBranch

Xander Bilt/Bah! They must be [i]Strider sympathizers[/i]. Crush them underfoot! ChangeExpression/Xander Bilt,Yell Mad Continue./EndConv
